Articles.Content:
Since apparently I'm "special" if I can see it, I'll just put this proof here.

![YH6dysG.png](http://i.imgur.com/YH6dysG.png)
Yup, I've got that too. So that means I'm special? Yeah, I'm special!!! Moar Hype!!! SoonTM!!!
Less being special little unique snowflakes (I'm getting my heat gun, brb...), moar hype dammit~!
Wow, if this many posts keep up during the night for me, we may have no problem reaching 300 posts and breaking the official record for longest hype train!

> 
> Less being special little unique snowflakes (I'm getting my heat gun, brb...), moar hype dammit~!

You may have heat, but we are many!!! We shall blanket your ground with our uniqueness!!
The techs deserve a great big round applause for putting out the server room HYPE fire the minute this goes live.

> 
> You may have heat, but we are many!!! We shall blanket your ground with our uniqueness!!

Okay fine, I'm getting the snowblower, brb~

hehe~

> 
> You may have heat, but we are many!!! We shall blanket your ground with our uniqueness!!

And I will cover you with various artificial fruit flavors and colors, and consume you.

NEW! In the Hypetrain Snack Bar! Special Snowflake Slushies! Get 'em while they're special! Get 'em while they're slushies!
![1duLEyc.png](http://i.imgur.com/1duLEyc.png)![YH6dysG.png](http://i.imgur.com/YH6dysG.png) It looks different on different screens, these are not my pics.
I tell myself I want to go to bed, but this thread... It has a waking power...

I have finally finished off my last craft (a station).

Purging gamedata, hello clean slate.

Destroying saves.

Clearing out remaining bits of stuff in the KSP folder.

I am now ready! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/1duLEyc.png](http://i.imgur.com/1duLEyc.png) [http://i.imgur.com/YH6dysG.png](http://i.imgur.com/YH6dysG.png) It looks different on different screens, these are not my pics.

I think the browser is just differently shaped.
One more hour to go!
It's Midnight lads! It's the WITCHING **HOUR**

> 
> I have finally finished off my last craft (a station).
> Purging gamedata, hello clean slate.
> 
> Destroying saves.
> 
> Clearing out remaining bits of stuff in the KSP folder.
> 
> I am now ready! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Did that this morning, I saved a seat for you also. You might want to sit down though, the G's are already approaching lethal levels. Moar Hype!!! SoonTM!!!

> 
> It's Midnight lads! It's the WITCHING **HOUR**

Although on forum time it's 11:00, and where I live it's 9.

> 
> Although on forum time it's 11:00, and where I live it's 9.

Same here, 3 more hours to go before midnight.
Well,ya'll jus' have ta' RUIN THE FUN........just kidding! ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
I didn't follow earlier Squad releases but do they usually occur after midnight (now?) or "the next morning"?
Looks like it's 11:00, mexico time.

Those three last updates on SteamDB are still there, no new ones.

Maybe in the morning?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> I didn't follow earlier Squad releases but do they usually occur after midnight (now?) or "the next morning"?

I am wondering that too actually.
website updating

Holy crap, I missed the pre-party.

And I'm gonna miss the post-party- Bad graphics card...

Ey, does anyone think Squad will actually care about the release reviews, seeing how punches won't be held because of the in-dev tag anymore?
For reference, here's what the "special" screen looks like on mobile: [http://imgur.com/v9qHtdS](http://imgur.com/v9qHtdS)

> 
> I think the browser is just differently shaped.

I'm not sure how the standard works, but it is a CSS background tag so it does "strange things" based on the resolution or whatever the browser specifies.
